title: ‘AI is going to change creativity,’ Bill Gates tells Doha Forum
description: AI’s impact will be universal, comparing it to ‘chips or electricity or advanced medicines,’ says Gates

title: ‘AI is going to change creativity,’ Bill Gates tells Doha Forum
description: ISTANBUL Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates said Saturday that artificial intelligence will fundamentally transform creativity, education, healthcare, and economic development worldwide,The post ‘AI is going to change creativity,’ Bill Gates tells Doha Forum appeared first on Daily News World News Turkish Turkey.

title: Govt plans AI Centre to modernise industry
description: Institutions will establish funding mechanism for AI development, machinery upgrade

title: Meta strikes multiple AI deals with publishers
Anthropic's resident philosopher shares her tips to create the best AI prompts
description: Amanda Askell, a member of Anthropic's technical team and a trained philosopher, shared some pro-tips for getting the most of AI chatbots.
